mapper.sql: ${alias}GROUP_ID as groupId ,${alias}PRODUCT_ID as productId ,${alias}PARENT_GROUP_ID as parentGroupId ,${alias}GROUP_NAME as groupName ,${alias}GROUP_INFO as groupInfo ,${alias}GROUP_CODE as groupCode ,${alias}IS_INHERIT as isInherit ,${alias}LEFT_VALUE as leftValue ,${alias}RIGHT_VALUE as rightValue ,${alias}CREATE_TIME as createTime ,${alias}EDIT_TIME as editTime ,${alias}DELETE_TIME as deleteTime ,${alias}DATA_STATE as dataState
